mapper.select: SELECT EMP_PWD FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT ROWNUM, EMP_NO, EMP_ID, EMP_PWD, EMP_NAME, DEP_NAME, JOB_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, EMAIL, PHONE, EMERGENCY_PHONE, ADDRESS, SALARY, HIRE_DATE, LEAVE_DATE, PHONE_REVEAL, STATUS, JOB_CODE, DEP_ID, MODI_FILENAME, EMP_TYPE, POSITION_NO, POSITION_NAME FROM (SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_ID, E.EMP_PWD, E.EMP_NAME,D.DEP_NAME, J.JOB_NAME, E.BIRTH_DATE, E.EMAIL, E.PHONE, E.EMERGENCY_PHONE, E.ADDRESS, E.SALARY, E.HIRE_DATE, E.LEAVE_DATE, E.PHONE_REVEAL, E.STATUS, J.JOB_CODE, D.DEP_ID, A.MODI_FILENAME, A.EMP_TYPE, PR.POSITION_NO, P.POSITION_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPT_RECORD DR ON(E.EMP_NO = DR.EMP_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(D.DEP_ID = DR.DEP_ID) JOIN JOB_RECORD JR ON(E.EMP_NO = JR.EMP_NO) JOIN JOB J ON (J.JOB_CODE = JR.JOB_CODE) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(A.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) JOIN POSITION_RECORD PR ON(PR.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) JOIN POSITION P ON(P.POSITION_NO = PR.POSITION_NO) WHERE E.EMP_ID= #{empId} AND E.STATUS='Y' AND A.EMP_TYPE='ET1' ORDER BY DR.DEP_RECORD_DATE DESC, JR.JOB_RECORD_DATE DESC, PR.POSITION_RECORD_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE (EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, EMAIL, PHONE, EMERGENCY_PHONE, ADDRESS, SALARY, HIRE_DATE, PHONE_REVEAL, STATUS) VALUES(EMP_NO.NEXTVAL, #{empName}, #{birthDate}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{emergencyPhone}, #{address}, #{salary}, SYSDATE, #{phoneReveal}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, EMP_NO FROM EMPLOYEE ORDER BY EMP_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, ORI_FILENAME, MODI_FILENAME, UPLOAD_DATE, EMP_NO, EMP_TYPE) VALUES(FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{oriFileName}, #{modiFileName}, SYSDATE, #{empNo}, #{empType})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, DEP_RECORD_NO, DEP_NAME, DEP_PHONE, DEP_RECORD_DATE, DEP_REASON, EMP_NAME FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, DR.DEP_RECORD_NO, D.DEP_NAME, D.DEP_PHONE, DR.DEP_RECORD_DATE, DR.DEP_REASON, E.EMP_NAME FROM DEPT_RECORD DR JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(D.DEP_ID = DR.DEP_ID) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(E.EMP_NO = DR.EMP_NO) WHERE D.STATUS = 'Y' AND E.EMP_ID = #{empId} ORDER BY DR.DEP_RECORD_DATE DESC)

SELECT ROWNUM, JOB_RECORD_NO, JOB_NAME, JOB_RECORD_DATE, JOB_REASON, EMP_NO FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, JR.JOB_RECORD_NO, J.JOB_NAME, JR.JOB_RECORD_DATE, JR.JOB_REASON, E.EMP_NO FROM JOB_RECORD JR JOIN JOB J ON(J.JOB_CODE = JR.JOB_CODE) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(E.EMP_NO = JR.EMP_NO) WHERE E.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY JR.JOB_RECORD_DATE DESC)

SELECT ROWNUM, POSITION_RECORD_NO, POSITION_NAME, POSITION_REASON, POSITION_RECORD_DATE, EMP_NAME FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, PR.POSITION_RECORD_NO, P.POSITION_NAME, PR.POSITION_REASON, PR.POSITION_RECORD_DATE, E.EMP_NAME FROM POSITION_RECORD PR JOIN POSITION P ON(P.POSITION_NO = PR.POSITION_NO) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(E.EMP_NO = PR.EMP_NO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' AND E.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY POSITION_RECORD_DATE DESC)
